updateInfo.title: Using IBM Carbon
updateInfo.desc: Caravel now uses IBM Carbon, a data-driven & open-source user interface framework.

updateInfo.title: In case you missed it:
updateInfo.desc: These are the updates from v0.6.0.
features: Modal no longer flashes on page load
Nickname courses on the course homepage
Page not found prompts to open in Canvas
Prompt to open unloadable resources in a new tab
Canvas home page links are automatically extracted
Dashboard has a date range picker to load assignments
